#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
int readint() {
  int n = 0;
  char c = getchar_unlocked();
  while ( !( '0' <= c && c <= '9' ) ) {
    c = getchar_unlocked();
  }
  while ( '0' <= c && c <= '9' ) {
    n = n * 10 + c - '0';
    c = getchar_unlocked();
  }
  return n;
}
int main()
{
  int i , n , *arr;
  arr =  ( int *)malloc( sizeof(int)*1000002);
  long long int tmp , ans = 0 , m = 0;
  memset( arr , 0 , sizeof(arr) );
  scanf("%d" , &n);
  for( i = 0 ; i < n ; i++ )
  {
    int x;
    x = readint();
    arr[x]++;
  }
  for( i = 1 ; i <= 1000000 ; i++ )
  {
    tmp = arr[i];
    tmp *= arr[i] - 1;
    tmp /= 2;
    m += tmp;
  }
  ans = n;
  ans *= n-1;
  ans /= 2;
  printf("%lld" , ans - m );
  free(arr);
  return 0;
}
